nodes.text: Saber Enterprises appeared to be a legitimate corporation headed by Renik during the Galactic Civil War, but in fact it was a front for much of the Empire's counter-espionage operations.
Guri, following orders by Xizor, paid 10,000 credits to a Rebel chief mechanic on the moon of Kile in order to program Wes Janson's R2 droid to shoot Luke Skywalker.
The payment followed such routes so that it appeared that it ultimately traced to Saber Enterprises, showing that Darth Vader supposedly wanted Luke dead.
